attributes.action: no more money to bail greece out
attributes.additional_details: if germany want the british tax payer to bail out greece to keep it in the euro or money if greece leaves the euro.this should not be done until there is a full referendum on europe david cameron keeps blameing labour saying we spent all the money but he still gives billons to europe of maybe towards greece if germany has it way. i need people in this country to stop moaning and sign this e petition and put this country first for a change.mark cherry labour party
